testcase.name: Verify the functionality of new deals creation
testcase.system-out: Given that the user is on the login page for dealsmap.......................passed And click on the Login button for dealsmap..................................passed When provided the valid username and password for dealsmap..................passed And click on the login buttom for dealsmap..................................passed And clicks on the deals->New option for dealsmap............................passed And fill the title,description and probability for dealsmap.................passed And click on Save button for dealsmap.......................................passed Then deal should be added for dealsmap......................................passed
